reviews.text: Lovely park and people very historical buildings
Great place to hang out with the family. Gets crowded in the evenings.

On a busy, sunny afternoon you encounter a people watching extravaganza. The large park with wide walks, shade trees, and fountains bustle with rural folk peddling their crafts, tourists from around the world, soap box speakers competing for an audience, travelers waiting to exchange currency, police scurrying about, musicians playing loudly over the din, and those just taking a break.
Very pretty night time visit, lots of great quirky bars and restaurants. Live music too! Beautiful area. Can be a bit pricey
Wonderful place to be
Edificio de la Municipalidad de Heredia.
Muy buen trato
Es muy lindo
Edificio bien conservado

It's a small charming museum with some art exhibitions and workshops all year round.
Nice place
Culture

Es un museo donde se alberga la historia de un hombre que impacto la historia económica y tributaria a principios del siglo XX. 

Alfredo González Flores Nació en Heredia, Costa Rica, el 15 de junio de 1877, se graduó del Liceo de Costa Rica en 1896 y recibió el título de abogado. Fue hijo de Domingo González Pérez, Segundo Designado a la Presidencia de 1914 a 1917, y Elemberta Flores. Contrajo nupcias en Heredia el 14 de mayo de 1922 con Delia Morales Gutiérrez, hija de Braulio Morales Cervantes y Esmeralda Gutiérrez. En 1898 efectuó un viaje a la Gran Bretaña, donde se interesó por las ciencias económicas, en las que llegó a ser un verdadero experto. Se graduó de abogado en la Escuela de Derecho y se incorporó al Colegio de Abogados el 1 de septiembre de 1902, con el número 34.

Participó en los movimientos opositores al Presidente don Rafael Yglesias Castro en 1897 y participó en la campaña política de 1905 apoyando la candidatura de don Máximo Fernández Alvarado. De 1910 a 1914 fue diputado del Partido Republicano por la provincia de Heredia. Presentó un proyecto para la creación de un banco hipotecario, que fue aprobado por el Congreso pero vetado por el Presidente Ricardo Jiménez Oreamuno

Elegido por el Congreso como Primer Designado a la Presidencia para el período 1914-1918, fue llamado a ejercer el poder durante todo el período por haber renunciado los dos candidatos que habían obtenido mayor número de votos en las elecciones presidenciales de diciembre de 1913, don Máximo Fernández Alvarado y don Carlos Durán Cartín. Como Segundo y Tercer Designados a la Presidencia fueron elegidos Domingo González Pérez y Francisco Aguilar Barquero.

Durante administración se creó el Banco Internacional de Costa Rica y se dictaron importantes leyes en materia tributaria. Se fundó la Escuela Normal de Heredia para la preparación de maestros. Sin embargo, también se cometieron serios abusos en torno a la pureza electoral, sobre todo con los comicios legislativos de 1915, en los cuales casi todos los diputados elegidos fueron del partido gubernamental.

Alfredo González fue de los pocos mandatarios que utilizó el Castillo Azul como residencia presidencial.

Fue derrocado por su Secretario de Guerra y Marina Federico Alberto Tinoco Granados el 27 de enero de 1917.
Excelente la exposición fotográfica sobre la historia de Heredia realizada por Don Manrique Alvarez.  Recomendadísimo su visita.
Muy linda
Acogedor lugar para pasar rápido a orar
Linda, pero lástima el montón de cables que tiene al frente
La Iglesia de El Carmen es una de las iglesias más emblemáticas de Heredia junto con La Inmaculada son los dos templos históricos de La Ciudad de Las Flores.
Excelente lugar, limpio ordenado y maravilloso.
We have a great experience visiting La Paz Waterfall resort & zoo even on a raining day. I bought simple rain ponchos on Amazon that came in so handy with all the rain in the rain forest.

This is an amazing waterfall garden and rescue animal sanctuary. We spent several hours here, first observing the variety of rescue animals - birds, snakes, monkeys, cats, etc. They also have a hummingbird observatory and butterfly house. We then hiked their trails to see all of the waterfalls. The paths are well maintained and as long as you can travel up and down many stairs the way is easy. You can also choose different paths that skips some of the more challenging paths. Well worth the trip!
One of the best and most unique places to visit in Costa Rica.
Awesome waterfalls and wildlife sanctuary. Lots to see and do.

Breathtaking waterfalls! Very rare to see 3 sections of waterfalls in one view! Big volume and fast speed. We could get very close to it. The trial was very easy to walk on. Lots of stairs but all go down hill made it easy. Absolutely beautiful!
Best hand made arts

El lugar inspira paz, con su música instrumental y su incienso de aroma suave. No es una tienda común es una galería donde muestra en sus piezas arte, historia... Cada una de ellas indica quien lo hizo, cuando duró la labor... Las que fueron expuestas en el Museo Nacional son aun mas impresionantes. 
Además de eso en Galería Octagono se ofrecen esos pequeños detalles de arte textil, individuales, aislantes, pulseras, collares, bolsos todo aquello que permita tener un recuerdo humano, sencillo pero sobre todo de la gran artista Silvia Piza-Tandlich quien marca su estilo en cada rincón. Super recomendado para disfrutar del arte, paz y darte los pequeños gustitos, todos ellos HECHOS 100% A MANO.
Muy buenas exposiciones de arte
Not so bad, but it could be better.
We have been here a few times it is close to where my daughter goes to the university each time the service and food as been great good prices OK salad bar need more parking but OK
Comida con buen sabor, precios variados, cómodos y también caros. Buena atención, parqueo para pocos autos (3) . Aseado y espacioso. Lo recomiendo.
El menú es bastante variado, la comida es super deliciosa y los precios muy accesibles... Me encanta el arroz con camarones

Para las 3B bueno, bonito y barato, es delicioso les recomiendo q escojan el menú q esta puesto en la mesa todo es delicioso y barato incluye todo (ensalada, refresco y el plato principal) a un comodo precio, muy bueno. El mejor en Heredia centro. Tiene parqueo como para tres carros nada mas

Buenisimo desayuno perfecto sabor 
Still great place 
Food amazing and cheap , place is beautiful couzy,  staff always friendly

Great good for the price. Big rations
Chicken sandwich was good & heavy brunch!!
Great food and service ! Also really good natural fruit juices.
Great good, nice place and warm people. One of my favorite sushi places with several options to enjoy!
This was very nice and prices were reasonable.

Always always always my sushi place, none like Sushi Home in Heredia the best, very recommended pretty, cozy and classy, but as in C.R you have to wait to be served, like wait wait, but it's worth it.
Really good sushi good service nice and clean place affordable prices .
Excellent service and the food is delicious. There are also tables and a sofa outisde.
Great good, nice place and warm people. One of my favorite sushi places with several options to enjoy!

Really good sushi good service nice and clean place affordable prices .
Excellent service and the food is delicious. There are also tables and a sofa outisde.

If you want quality sushi for a reasonable price, this is the place to go. They have a variety of different dishes to choose from, and i can assure you that you won't be disappointed. The staff are friendly, and the sushi is prepared within 10 minutes. I can recommend the grilled eel there, it's pretty good.
High quality sushi, very reasonable prices.
My favorite place to buy sushi. The space is very small so this is not a place to sit down and dine, but it's perfect for take away.

Compact restaurant, but cosy. Price is reasonable (at least in Norway). The staffs are very friendly. I saw people walk in and out, and they were greeted by the staffs, looks like they know their neighborhood customers pretty well. 
The only little down side is the tuna could be more fresh. I’m from Japan, it’s pretty easy to tell the freshness of your fish. 
Overall, not bad!
Probably the best sushi I have ever ate. Fresh and tasteful fish, reasonable price and very good sushi. If you are sushi lover and you are in Bergen - check it!
Best food that you can say its clean, true,and from the corazon.👍👌
The best Libanese food I've tried!
Great
food is awesome!
Close on Sunday

Was good as always the view is amazing¡! The food is great but one thing that discouraged me was the fact that most of the diseases on the menu were not available so, it was kinda hard to order food...

THE GOOD: The place is great. The sights are amazing.

THE BAD: Everything is excessively overpriced. I know this kind of places are not cheap at all, but Baalbek took it too far.

THE UGLY: On top of everything being excessively overpriced, many of the dishes displayed in the menu were not available for dinner on a regular day!
Great place and amaizing view.. . food was not so good ..
Nice place but the view...no words to describe it...
Great food and beautiful restaurant. We sat upstairs and from the balcony looked over the city in the valley below us as we dined. It was magical.
Good price vs food

Comida de tradición cubana. Excelente sabor.
Muy buena atención.
Buen precio.
Lugar acogedor y la comida excelente.
Pequeña soda limpia, ordenada, decorada con fotografías de Cuba, muy buen café cubano. Ofrece plato del día.
Deliciosa comida, muy buenos precios y una atención esmerada.

Food and season drinks are excellent. Waiters attend pretty fast. The time for the food to arrive takes around 25 minutes once we order . The parking space is a little bit small and there is not plenty room for cars.

Excellent food and great service, very accommodating to vegan necessities. The cancer patient that accompanied us ordered the vegetables cooked in a small amount of olive oil which were tasty and cooked to perfection. Our special requests were not a problem for them!

very good food, service and price.

their meals are colombian.
Food is good but prices are exaggerated. Arepas are tiny and expensives
My first attempt at Colombian. Loved the decor. Really good food

It's just a quick bite if you're hungry, although they take a long time to prepare it. You can choose the ingredients and it's cheap. Good just to satisfy the stomach, but not nice or delicious, just ok
Good 🍕 they have different cost if you pay on cash

Best pizza, fresh ingredients, real Italian cheese in the four cheese pizza. Always busy which is a good sign.

Comida corriente y muy cara. Sabores diluidos para ahorrar en gastos. Le ponen agua a la mayonesa. Donde se ha visto eso. Y carisimo. No pedir sandwiches. Insípidos sin sabor.
Great food, excellent customer service and delivered main dishes pretty fast. Recommended no doubts.

Oh WOW!!! The owner is AMAZING, the food oh the food, THE FOOD, tender meat, everything is cooked perfectly. The service is GREAT you don't have to wait a long time for anything. I'll rep this place everyday ALL day. It's just incredible! More than recommended don't come to Heredia and miss out on La Candelaria anything you eat there is/will be GREAT guaranteed. Just an explosion of flavors!!!
Nice place, good price, goos service
Great food, great location, good pricing.. but most important.. they're pet friendly 🐾🐾  one of the best places to go with my dogs.
Somewhat pricey but worth it. Great place to meet and enjoy coffee at a pleasant place.
The food was delicious. I'm happy I found a vegan place to go in Daejeon. They even sell other vegan items like detergent, chocolate bars, soap and soy protein. Will definitely go back!
Friendly owner who speaks English well:) The food is great too!

Great place. Gorgeous place and delicious coffee. The people is nice.
Coffee shop, restaurant, good food lots of good signature coffees

Awesome cafe.  Went here for breakfast on a Sunday before flying back home.  The dining area is a covered open air area that has a lot of plants surrounding it.  The ambiance is very chic and refreshing and they play good mellow / chill music.  The coffee is fantastic and the food as well.  Highly recommend.
Nice cozy place, excellent food and coffee
Cozy place. Great for brunching. Great food and service. Affordable prices.
